jules_alpha_fix.title: Track_Alpha_Redemption_Fix
jules_alpha_fix.instruction: PR Review result: REQUEST_CHANGES. Please fix the brittle test in 'tests/verify_td_115_111.py'. Replace the hardcoded asset expectation (assert baseline == 101800.0) with a dynamic calculation based on the fixtures provided in the test file.

jules_bravo.title: Track_Bravo_Remediation
jules_bravo.instruction: Fix Phantom Tax (TD-110) by enforcing Settle->Record and formalize IBankService (TD-119). Refer to the attached spec.

jules_core_correction.instruction:
PR Review result: REQUEST_CHANGES. Please fix the following structural gaps:

1. [ai_driven_household_engine.py]: Replace 'pass' with logger.warning for fid parsing failures in _place_buy_orders.
2. [tick_scheduler.py]: Add logger.warning when fallback values are used for GovernmentPolicyDTO properties.
3. Implement all suggestions in design/gemini_output/pr_review_remediation-td116-118-12570818305275603561.md.

git_review.instruction: Analyze this PR. Check behavior logic and test coverage.
